lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama announced a new program Thursday to attract more private money to help pay to build new roads and bridges as he criticized Congress for refusing to approve a more lasting source of funding.

headline.main: Obama Pushes Transportation Money at Closed Bridge
headline.print_headline: Obama Pushes Transportation Money at Closed Bridge

snippet: President Barack Obama announced a new program Thursday to attract more private money to help pay to build new roads and bridges as he criticized Congress for refusing to approve a more lasting source of funding....
